Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.selfLink = "http://"_##class(Settings).GetWebAppDomain()_##class(Settings).GetWebAppAdmin()_"/participant/"_..%Id() set proxy.competition = ..Competition.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.couple = ..Couple.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.created = ..CreatedTS
quit proxy
